com.lpoo.game.view.screens

Class CustomizeMenuScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
      • com.lpoo.game.view.screens.MenuScreen
        • com.lpoo.game.view.screens.CustomizeMenuScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen

    class CustomizeMenuScreen
extends MenuScreen
    A view representing the Customize Menu screen. In this Menu the User is able to chose which appearance his ball shall have.

    • Method Detail

      • createSkins

        private void createSkins(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Table table)
        Function used to create the Skins' Buttons and Labels and associate them to a given table, organized. It also adds Listeners to the Skins' Buttons.
        Parameters:
        table - Table where the Skins' Labels and Buttons will be organized.

      • initializeCurrentSkin

        private void initializeCurrentSkin()
        Initialize the currentSkin. Sets only the currentSkin's label to visible.

      • setCurrentLabel

        private void setCurrentLabel(int j)
        Updates the Current Skin, setting it to the index of the skin of the pressed Label.
        Parameters:
        j - Index of the skin of the pressed Label.

      • createStaticElements

        private void createStaticElements(com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Table table,
                                  com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.ui.Table skinsTable)
        Function responsible for creating the static Elements of the Stage (Scroller and Back Button), and organize them. Also adds Listeners to its Elements.
        Parameters:
        table - Table where the static elements will be organized.
        skinsTable - Table containing the level buttons, that will be associated to the scroller.
